name: quant-arbitrage-system-hyperspeed-x100
description: Quant Arbitrage System: Hyperspeed X100 Edition - Full-stack arbitrage trading system

scripts.verify:engine: cd ultra-fast-arbitrage-engine && npm run build && npm test
scripts.verify:all: npm run verify:system && npm run verify
scripts.build:all: cd ultra-fast-arbitrage-engine && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:rust: cd ultra-fast-arbitrage-engine && npm run build:rust && cd ..
scripts.test:comprehensive: npm run test:js && npm run test:python && npm run verify:backend
scripts.health: if command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -s http://localhost:3001/api/health | jq; else echo 'jq not found. Please install jq for pretty-printed output.'; curl -s http://localhost:3001/api/health; fi
scripts.logs:backend: cd backend && npm run logs || tail -f logs/system.log
scripts.help:
echo '
ðŸ“š Available Commands:
  npm run setup          - One-click installation
  npm run verify:system  - Verify system health
  npm run verify         - Verify all modules
  npm run test:all       - Run all tests
  npm run deploy         - Deploy with Docker
  npm run pool:fetch     - Fetch pool data
  npm run health         - Check API health
  npm run help           - Show this help

For more info, see INSTALL.md and README.md
'

author: Omni-Tech-Stack
